about.seoTitle: About Us - Learn About UltraVioleta DAO
about.seoDescription: Discover UltraVioleta DAO - A decentralized community building Web3 infrastructure in Latin America. Learn about our mission, vision, values, and journey since 2022.

hero.title: History of Ultravioleta DAO
hero.subtitle: From a streaming community to the most active Web3 DAO in Latin America

origin.title: History and Origin
origin.paragraph1: The history of Ultravioleta DAO began in March 2022 under the initial name 'Cuchorapido', a community created from live streams on Twitch. The initial focus revolved around Web3 topics, decentralized technology, digital consciousness, and the practical exploration of these tools in front of an active and participatory audience.
origin.paragraph2: What started as a simple platform to discuss abstract concepts quickly became a dynamic space where the audience not only listened but intervened, proposed ideas, and made real decisions.
origin.paragraph3: As the community consolidated, the natural need arose to organize through more sophisticated tools, leading to the launch of the first governance token, CRT, initially deployed on Polygon. This first stage served as a live laboratory, allowing understanding of decentralized governance processes through practice.
origin.paragraph4: After two years of continuous growth, in June 2024 the community decided to take another step and formalize as Ultravioleta DAO, maintaining the original core but with a renewed identity that reflected its evolution. This change marked the definitive transition to a fully operational and established decentralized organization, with a new token called UVD, currently active on the Avalanche network.

march2022.title: Birth as Cuchorapido
march2022.description: Community inception through live streams on Twitch, exploring Web3 and decentralized technology.

crt.title: CRT Token and Governance
crt.description: Launch of the first governance token CRT on Polygon, later migrated to Avalanche as CRT v2.

partner2022.title: Twitch Partner
partner2022.description: CuchoRapido achieves Partner status with 75 viewer average. Development of Caldo de Gallina automation bot.

september2023.title: Meetups and Stream Fighters
september2023.description: In-person events in Bogotá and Medellín. Participation in Stream Fighters with NFT betting. DatBoi hired for leadership.

january2024.title: Avalanche Migration
january2024.description: Complete migration to Avalanche C-Chain. 100 Core wallets opened on stream. 55 Avalanche Fundamentals certificates completed.

june2024.title: Transformation to Ultravioleta DAO
june2024.description: Formalization as Ultravioleta DAO with renewed identity and launch of UVD token on Avalanche.

july2024.title: Crisis and Rebirth
july2024.description: Token misconfigured, contract drained. Community stays united. UVT v2 created and distributed 1:1.

october2024.title: Avalanche Summit Argentina
october2024.description: 10 DAO members attend the summit. Development of Karma Hello and Abracadabra v2 with Cursor AI.

october18_2024.title: First Validator with Delegation
october18_2024.description: We received our first validator with delegation thanks to Meta Pool, as part of the Node Studio Cohort 2 program. An important milestone in our technical infrastructure.

october26_2024.title: x402 Facilitator Launch
october26_2024.description: We launched the x402 Facilitator, a tool to facilitate cross-chain transactions. Currently works on Avalanche, Celo, and Base (mainnet and testnet).

october28_2024.title: Web3 Communities World Cup Winners
october28_2024.description: UltraVioleta DAO wins the Spanish Web3 Communities World Cup competition, consolidating our position as a leader in the Latin American Web3 community.

december2024.title: Medellín Meetup 2024
december2024.description: Community gathering in Medellín with active DAO members, strengthening bonds and planning the future.

january2025.title: Crypto Explosion and UVD
january2025.description: Migration UVT→UVD on Arena DEX. LP ATH $22K. BEAM validator launch. 0xUltravioleta Twitch Partner.

august23_2025.title: Ultra Event 2025
august23_2025.description: First official public event of UltraVioleta DAO at Hash House Club, Medellín. Historic event with 212 registered and 144 attendees. Conferences, workshops and networking with the Latin American Web3 community.

august24_2025.title: Ultra Meetup 2025
august24_2025.description: Day after Ultra Event, intimate community gathering to strengthen bonds between the most active DAO members. Special celebration with the main event attendees.

duna2025.title: Legal Registration as DAO LLC
duna2025.description: Legal formalization as a DAO LLC in Wyoming, establishing UltraVioleta as a Decentralized Autonomous Organization Limited Liability Company.

current.title: Fully Operational DAO
current.description: 176+ executed proposals, 5,218+ votes, DAO LLC legal structure established, and in-person events in multiple cities.

sponsors.gratitude: Thanks to all our sponsors for making this legendary event possible

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: Ultravioleta DAO seeks to establish itself as a Latin American reference in Web3 culture creation, promoting open education, technological experimentation, and effective community participation.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: Maintain a decentralized space for collective learning, where practical experimentation, trial-and-error, and real-time decision-making are the core of our daily dynamics.

learning.title: Learning in Public
learning.description: Document and share both successes and failures, strengthening a culture based on radical transparency.

community.title: Active Participation
community.description: Every member has voice and vote in important decisions, building the DAO's future together.

transparency.title: Radical Transparency
transparency.description: Everything is recorded, everything can be audited, and everyone can participate in governance.

education.title: Continuous Education
education.description: Daily streams on Twitch, The Arena and X, with live voting and decision-making.

governance.title: Active Governance
governance.description: 176 governance proposals executed on Snapshot, with over 5,218 votes cast by the community.

economy.title: Gamified Economy
economy.description: Watch-to-Earn, Chat-to-Earn and Burn-to-Chat: reward systems and incentives for active participation.

infrastructure.title: Technical Infrastructure
infrastructure.description: Management of validator nodes on testnets and mainnets, offering practical experience to members.

events.title: In-Person Events
events.description: Meetups in Bogotá, Medellín and preparation for Ultra Evento 2025 with 100+ participants.

ai.title: Community AI
ai.description: Development of intelligent agents 'Karma' and 'Hello' to optimize tasks and manage rewards automatically.

governance.title: Governance Token Experience
governance.paragraph1: The implementation and evolution of the governance token was key to the community. Each migration, from CRT to UVD, meant a qualitative leap in organizational and decision-making capabilities.
governance.paragraph2: Decisions managed through the token include community budget allocation, speaker selection for events, reward determination, internal economic parameters, and definition of foundational documents such as manifestos and DAO constitutions.
governance.paragraph3: The token not only facilitated practical governance but also aligned interests and created a strong sense of responsibility and shared value among participants.

structure.title: Horizontal Structure
structure.description: Currently, Ultravioleta DAO has a horizontal structure, without traditional hierarchies, where roles are assumed voluntarily according to affinity and availability. Our technological infrastructure includes robust platforms such as Snapshot, multisigs with multiple signers, specialized bots, and proprietary dashboards for real-time tracking.

projects.title: Ultra Event 2025
projects.description: The main project completed was Ultra Event 2025, held on August 24 in Medellín with 212 registered and 144 attendees. Historic event with the support of renowned sponsors such as Avalanche, Rekt, Celo Colombia, Self, Uniswap, Pyth Network, Heroes Of Cipher, deBridge, Superfluid, and Magic Eden. It featured innovative dynamics such as automatic airdrops, POAPs, identity verification incentives, and complete streaming coverage.

legal.title: Legal Status - DAO LLC
legal.description: UltraVioleta DAO has successfully completed its registration as a Decentralized Autonomous Organization Limited Liability Company (DAO LLC) in Wyoming, United States. This pioneering legal structure allows us to operate with legal recognition while maintaining our decentralized nature.
legal.whatIsDuna: DAO LLC is an innovative legal structure designed specifically for DAOs, allowing decentralized organizations to obtain legal personality without compromising their autonomy. Learn more at
legal.benefits: This legal structure provides us with limited liability protection for members, legal recognition for contracts and agreements, clear regulatory compliance, and the ability to maintain our decentralized governance through on-chain voting and smart contracts.

featuredOn.title: Featured On
featuredOn.subtitle: UltraVioleta DAO has been featured in major blockchain and Web3 specialized media outlets

cointelegraph.description: "Blockchain is a tool for coordination and radical transparency", according to founder Saúl Jaramillo. Full article about our mission, governance, and next steps.

blockchain.title: What does blockchain technology mean for Ultravioleta DAO?
blockchain.paragraph1: Blockchain, for Ultravioleta, is a tool for coordination and radical transparency. It has allowed us to distribute value, make collective decisions, and organize our community without hierarchies. It's infrastructure, but also culture: everything is recorded, everything can be audited, and everyone can participate.
blockchain.paragraph2: In Latin America, where traditional systems often fail or don't reach, blockchain offers a parallel path to build trust, create our own economies, and new forms of collaboration. For us, it's not a future promise, but a daily practice that is already generating real impact from the bottom up and outward.

book.title: Echoes of Yesterday: What Time Did Not Erase
book.subtitle: Spanish Edition - Kindle Edition
book.author: By Luis Alfonso Jaramillo Gallego
book.description: Echoes of Yesterday: What Time Did Not Erase is an autobiographical memoir by Luis Alfonso Jaramillo Gallego, which honestly and deeply explores the multiple stages of his life: from childhood to old age, through personal transformations, social challenges, and spiritual reconciliations.

content.item1: His childhood in a rural environment that planted the fundamental values of his character.
content.item2: The transition to adolescence and the internal and social conflicts he experienced in the city.
content.item3: His professional path as a lawyer in Colombia, facing a judicial system full of contradictions.
content.item4: Forced exile to the United States due to violence, where he took on new trades and responsibilities.
content.item5: His emergence as a salesman and importer, and his commitment to family.
content.item6: His life as a couple, based on love, understanding, tolerance, and forgiveness as essential pillars of the family.
content.item7: Extreme experiences that confronted him with the fragility of life and the value of freedom.
content.item8: Reconnecting with his Jewish roots in maturity as part of an inner healing process.
content.item9: Reflections on the technological, cultural, and spiritual changes that marked his generation.

book.conclusion: More than a simple autobiography, this work is an invitation to honor the life lived, understand individual purpose, and accept that, even in the darkest moments, there is always a light ready to guide us towards transformation and healing.
book.benefit1: 60% of profits go directly to the DAO multisig
book.benefit2: 50% refunded in UVD tokens (exclusive for DAO members)

antiFarming.title: Multi-Layer Anti-Farming System

technology.title: Technologies
technology.ai: AI: OpenAI GPT-4, Anthropic Claude, Ollama
technology.blockchain: Blockchain: Avalanche C-Chain with RPC pool

q1.question: What is Chat-to-Earn?
q1.answer: Chat-to-Earn is a revolutionary Web3 concept where users earn cryptocurrency (UVD tokens) by participating in quality chat interactions on Twitch. Karma Hello evaluates message quality using 18+ AI agents and rewards users with tokens on the Avalanche blockchain.

q2.question: How does Karma Hello prevent farming and abuse?
q2.answer: Karma Hello uses a multi-layer anti-farming system with advanced ML models including BERT for text analysis, Isolation Forest for anomaly detection, and Gradient Boosting for fraud classification. Additionally, each message burns 1 UVD token, creating an economic disincentive for spam.

q3.question: What are the benefits for Echoes NFT holders?
q3.answer: Echoes NFT holders receive x2 rewards on all UVD tokens earned through Karma Hello. This exclusive benefit is applied automatically when the system detects NFT ownership in the user's connected wallet.

q4.question: How much can I earn with Karma Hello?
q4.answer: Rewards follow a Fibonacci distribution ranging from 10,946 to 832,040 UVD tokens per quality message. With Twitter Social Boost, multipliers range from 1.2x to 5.0x based on your social influence. Echoes NFT holders get an additional x2 multiplier on all rewards.

q5.question: What is the difference between Karma Hello and other chat bots?
q5.answer: Karma Hello uniquely combines 18+ AI agents (GPT-4, Claude, Ollama) to evaluate message quality in real-time, rewards users with actual cryptocurrency (UVD tokens) on Avalanche blockchain, implements advanced anti-farming ML models (BERT, Isolation Forest), and includes token burning mechanics for economic sustainability. No other bot offers this comprehensive Web3 integration.

q6.question: How do I start earning with Karma Hello?
q6.answer: To start earning: 1) Join the Twitch channel at twitch.tv/0xultravioleta, 2) Connect your Web3 wallet to the platform, 3) Start chatting with quality messages in the stream, 4) Receive UVD token rewards automatically based on AI evaluation, 5) Optional: Hold Echoes NFTs for 2x rewards or connect Twitter for social boost multipliers.

q7.question: Is Karma Hello available in multiple languages?
q7.answer: Yes, Karma Hello supports multiple languages including Spanish (ES), English (EN), Portuguese (PT), and French (FR). The AI agents can understand and evaluate message quality in all these languages, making it accessible for the entire Latin American and global community.

abracadabraExpanded.description: Abracadabra is a comprehensive platform that transforms Twitch streams and videos into actionable, searchable, and reusable content using advanced AI. With 5 complete development phases and 56+ API endpoints.

technology.title: Technology Stack
technology.ai: AI: OpenAI GPT-4o, Claude Sonnet 4, Whisper

useCases.title: Use Cases
useCases.creators: Content Creators: Stream analysis and reuse

q1.question: What is Abracadabra?
q1.answer: Abracadabra is a comprehensive stream analysis and content intelligence platform that transforms Twitch videos into actionable, searchable, and reusable content using advanced AI. It includes 6 complete phases: Analytics, Time Machine, Semantic Search, Content Intelligence, Predictive Analytics, and Multi-Agent System with real-time WebSocket.

q2.question: What type of content can it automatically generate?
q2.answer: Abracadabra can automatically generate markdown blogs (1500+ words), optimized Twitter threads (280 chars/tweet), video clips with FFmpeg in multiple formats (YouTube Shorts, TikTok, Reels), DALL-E 3 images, multi-language translations (10+ languages), and personalized summaries. All with 75+ REST API endpoints.

q3.question: How does semantic search work?
q3.answer: Abracadabra uses Cognee framework with OpenAI embeddings for natural language search. You can ask 'What did they say about NFTs?' and the system finds relevant content by understanding synonyms, context, and intentions. It includes a knowledge graph with 500+ nodes and multi-hop reasoning up to 3 jumps.

q4.question: What data has Abracadabra processed?
q4.answer: It has currently processed 70+ Twitch streams, indexed 640+ topics in Cognee, and has a complete analysis system with SQLite + vector store. Processing is fully automatic: download, dual transcription (AWS Transcribe + Whisper), GPT-4o analysis, and auto-indexing post-processing.

q5.question: How much does Abracadabra cost?
q5.answer: Abracadabra is currently in pre-order phase with special early access pricing for UltraVioleta DAO members. The platform will offer different tiers: Free tier (limited queries), Pro tier for content creators, and Enterprise tier for agencies and brands. Contact us for custom pricing and early access.

q6.question: Can Abracadabra analyze YouTube or other platforms?
q6.answer: While currently focused on Twitch streams, Abracadabra's architecture supports multi-platform expansion. The same AI pipeline (transcription, semantic analysis, content generation) can process YouTube videos, podcasts, webinars, and any video/audio content. Platform expansion is planned for Q2 2025.

q7.question: What makes Abracadabra's semantic search unique?
q7.answer: Abracadabra uses Cognee framework with OpenAI embeddings to understand context and meaning, not just keywords. It features a knowledge graph with 500+ nodes enabling multi-hop reasoning up to 3 levels deep, natural language queries in any language, and temporal search to find content from specific time periods. This allows queries like 'What did they say about NFTs last month?' to return accurate, contextual results.

abracadabraExpanded.fullDescription: Abracadabra is an enterprise content intelligence platform that uses advanced artificial intelligence to transform videos and streams into actionable content, semantic searches, and predictive analytics. Complete end-to-end system that converts raw audiovisual content into structured analytics, automatically derived content, and trend predictions.

streamSummaries.aboutDescription: Abracadabra is an automatic stream analysis system that generates detailed summaries using artificial intelligence. Each summary includes stream highlights, technical topics discussed, innovative ideas, and key moments.

operacionCamaleon.title: Operation Chameleon
operacionCamaleon.description: Community research on types of oils used in restaurants through decentralized crowdsourcing.
operacionCamaleon.summary: 7 community members investigated 35+ restaurants in different cities to identify the types of oils used in food preparation, receiving payments in USDC on Polygon.

results.item2: Identified patterns in the use of seed oils vs. healthy oils
